alt: Mixed media assemblage with constuction steel banding
title: Object 2007.01.001
description: Mixed media assemblage with construction steel banding
materials: Acylic paint, steel banding on wood panel

alt: Mixed media assemblage with branches, sand and a madrone leaf
title: Object 2001.08.002
description: Mixed media assemblage with branches, sand and a madrone leaf
materials: Oil, branches, sand and madrone leaf on wood panel

alt: Mixed media assemblage triptych evoking coastal themes
title: Boats
description: Mixed media assemblage evoking boat carcasses in Princeton Harbor, California.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on canvas

alt: Geometric abstract with money plant seed pods (Lunaria annua)
title: Object 2001.01.004
description: Geometric abstract with lichen, tree branch, sand and money plant seed pods (Lunaria annua). Money plant seed pods are distinctive, silvery, coin-like discs that form after the plant's spring flowers fade.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on wood pane

title: Object 2004.04.001
description: Pine sticks and money plant seed pods (Lunaria annua). Money plant seed pods are distinctive, silvery, coin-like discs that form after the plant's spring flowers fade.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on wood panel

title: Object 2004.04.003
description: A weathered branch breaks the frame, extending beyond a grid of aluminum rivets.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on wood panel

title: Object 2005.01.001
description: A totemic form. Rectangular base in gray sand texture, split by a central blue column with horizontal red bands.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on wood panel

alt: Abstract image of a boat hull
title: Object 2005.01.006
description: Pine sticks and found wires are used to construct an abstract image of a boat hull.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on wood panel

alt: Abstract image of the night sky in the mountains
title: Object 2002.07.002
description: Three horizontal panels in deep teal and blue-green, each divided into color fields. A small forked branch crosses each panel at a different position. The work evokes the night sky in the mountains.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on wood panel
